trans-unit.source: Provides a simple way to create and manage the contents of connection strings used by the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma maneira simple de criar e gerenciar o conteúdo de cadeias de caracteres de conexão usadas pelo <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The connection string builders let developers programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and parse and rebuild existing connection strings, using properties and methods of the class.
trans-unit.target: Os construtores de cadeia de caracteres de conexão permitem que os desenvolvedores programaticamente criar cadeias de caracteres de conexão sintaticamente correto e analisar e recriar as cadeias de caracteres de conexão existente, usando as propriedades e métodos da classe.

trans-unit.source: The connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known key/value pairs allowed by ODBC connections, and developers can add arbitrary key/value pairs for any other connection string values.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de cadeia de caracteres de conexão fornece fortemente tipada propriedades correspondentes para os pares chave/valor conhecido permitido por conexões ODBC e os desenvolvedores podem adicionar pares de chave/valor arbitrário para outros valores de cadeia de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the OdbcConnectionStringBuilder class to build and modify connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores que precisam criar cadeias de caracteres de conexão como parte dos aplicativos podem usar a classe OdbcConnectionStringBuilder para criar e modificar cadeias de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: A classe também torna fácil de gerenciar cadeias de caracteres de conexão armazenadas em um arquivo de configuração do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: OdbcConnectionStringBuilder performs checks only for the limited set of known key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: OdbcConnectionStringBuilder executa verificações somente para o conjunto limitado de pares chave/valor conhecido.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this class can be used to create invalid connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, essa classe pode ser usada para criar cadeias de caracteres de conexão inválido.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the specific known keys together with their corresponding properties within the OdbcConnectionStringBuilder class, and their default values.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista as chaves conhecidas específicas junto com suas propriedades correspondentes na classe OdbcConnectionStringBuilder e seus valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: Besides these specific values, developers can add any key/value pairs to the collection that is contained within the OdbcConnectionStringBuilder instance.
trans-unit.target: Além desses valores específicos, os desenvolvedores podem adicionar qualquer pares chave/valor na coleção que está contido dentro da instância de OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.

trans-unit.source: |Key|Property|Comment|Default value| |---------|--------------|-------------|-------------------| |Driver|<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A>|Developers should not include the braces surrounding the driver name when they set the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Chave | Propriedade | Comentário | Valor padrão | |---------|--------------|-------------|-------------------| | Driver | <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A>| Os desenvolvedores não devem incluir os colchetes ao redor do nome do driver quando eles definem o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OdbcConnectionStringBuilder instance adds braces as needed.|Empty string| |DSN|<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Dsn%2A>||Empty string| If any value (other than the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A> value) within the connection string contains a semicolon (;), the OdbcConnectionStringBuilder surrounds the value with quotation marks in the connection string.
trans-unit.target: A instância OdbcConnectionStringBuilder adiciona chaves conforme necessário. | Cadeia de caracteres vazia | | DSN | <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Dsn%2A>|| Cadeia de caracteres vazia | Se qualquer valor (diferente de <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A>valor) dentro de conexão a cadeia de caracteres contém um ponto e vírgula (;), o OdbcConnectionStringBuilder envolve o valor entre aspas na cadeia de conexão.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Dsn%2A>

trans-unit.source: In order to avoid this issue with the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A> value that frequently contains a semicolon, the OdbcConnectionStringBuilder class always surrounds this value with braces.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar esse problema com o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A>esse valor com colchetes ao redor do valor que contém um ponto e vírgula, a classe OdbcConnectionStringBuilder sempre, com frequência.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ODBC specification indicates that driver values that contain semicolons must be surrounded with braces, and this class handles this for you.
trans-unit.target: A especificação de ODBC indica que valores de driver que contenham ponto e vírgula devem estar entre chaves, e essa classe trata isso para você.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property handles attempts to insert malicious code.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>propriedade manipula as tentativas de inserir um código mal-intencionado.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code, using the default <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property (the indexer, in C#) correctly escapes the nested key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o código a seguir, usando o padrão <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>propriedade (o indexador, em c#) corretamente ignora o par chave/valor aninhado.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim builder As _ New System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder ' Take advantage of the Driver property. builder.Driver = "SQL Server" builder("Server") = "MyServer;NewValue=Bad" Console.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString) ``` [C#] ``` System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder(); // Take advantage of the Driver property. builder.Driver = "SQL Server"; builder["Server"] = "MyServer;NewValue=Bad"; Console.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString); ``` The result is the following connection string that handles the invalid value in a safe manner: ``` Driver={SQL Server};Server="MyServer;NewValue=Bad" ```
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim builder As _ New System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder ' Take advantage of the Driver property. builder.Driver = "SQL Server" builder("Server") = "MyServer;NewValue=Bad" Console.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString) ``` [C#] ``` System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder(); // Take advantage of the Driver property. builder.Driver = "SQL Server"; builder["Server"] = "MyServer;NewValue=Bad"; Console.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString); ``` o resultado é a seguinte cadeia de conexão que trata o valor inválido de maneira segura:``` Driver={SQL Server};Server="MyServer;NewValue=Bad" ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The provided connection string provides the data for the instance's internal connection information.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres de conexão fornecido fornece os dados para obter informações de conexão interna da instância.

trans-unit.source: You can pass a connection string in the constructor, or you can set the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A> property explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Você pode passar uma cadeia de caracteres de conexão no construtor, ou você pode definir o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A>propriedade explicitamente.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The behavior is the same either way.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento é o mesmo de qualquer forma.

trans-unit.source: The basis for the object's internal connection information.
trans-unit.target: A base de informações de conexão interna do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Parsed into key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: Analisado em pares chave/valor.

trans-unit.source: The connection string is incorrectly formatted (perhaps missing the required "=" within a key/value pair).
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres de conexão está formatada incorretamente (talvez sem o necessário "=" dentro de um par chave/valor).

trans-unit.source: Clears the contents of the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Limpa o conteúdo do <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The Clear method removes all key/value pairs from the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder> and resets the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Dsn%2A> properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: O método Clear remove todos os pares chave/valor da <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>e redefine o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A>e <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Dsn%2A>propriedades com seus valores padrão.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Dsn%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.Driver%2A> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The Clear method also sets the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A> property to 0 and the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString> property to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: O método Clear também define o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A>propriedade como 0 e o <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString>propriedade como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> contains a specific key.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> contém uma chave específica.

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A chave a ser localizado no <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> contains an element that has the specified key; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> contém um elemento que foi especificado chave; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: keyword is null ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keywordé nulo ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the ODBC driver associated with the connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do driver ODBC associado com a conexão.

trans-unit.source: If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the Driver property is reset.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor passado é nulo quando você tentar definir a propriedade, a propriedade do Driver é redefinida.

trans-unit.source: If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is `String.Empty`.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor não foi definido e o desenvolvedor tenta recuperar a propriedade, o valor de retorno é `String.Empty`.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Driver" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade corresponde à chave de "Driver" na cadeia de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Driver property, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_String.Empty" name="String.Empty" href=""></xref> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade de Driver, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_String.Empty" name="String.Empty" href=""> </xref> se nenhum foi fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data source name (DSN) associated with the connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do que o nome da fonte de dados (DSN) associado com a conexão.

trans-unit.source: If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the Dsn property is reset.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor passado é nulo quando você tentar definir a propriedade, a propriedade de Dsn é redefinida.

trans-unit.source: If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is `String.Empty`.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor não foi definido e o desenvolvedor tenta recuperar a propriedade, o valor de retorno é `String.Empty`.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Dsn" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade corresponde à chave "Dsn" na cadeia de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Dsn property, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_String.Empty" name="String.Empty" href=""></xref> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade Dsn, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_String.Empty" name="String.Empty" href=""> </xref> se nenhum foi fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor associado com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer.
trans-unit.target: No c#, essa propriedade é o indexador.

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, the value is replaced; otherwise, a new element is created.
trans-unit.target: Quando você definir essa propriedade, se a chave especificada já existe no dicionário, o valor será substituído; Caso contrário, um novo elemento é criado.

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to get or set.
trans-unit.target: A chave do item a ser obtido ou definido.

trans-unit.source: The value associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: O valor associado com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: The connection string is incorrectly formatted (perhaps missing the required "=" within a key/value pair).
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres de conexão está formatada incorretamente (talvez sem o necessário "=" dentro de um par chave/valor).

trans-unit.source: keyword is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keywordé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the keys in the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>que contém as chaves de <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is the same order as the associated values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A ordem dos valores no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>é a mesma ordem que os valores associados a <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>retornado pelo <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the keys in the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>que contém as chaves de <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Removes the entry with the specified key from the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Remove a entrada com a chave especificada do <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Because the Remove method returns a value that indicates its success, it is not required to look for the existence of a key before trying to remove the key/value pair from the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder> instance.
trans-unit.target: Como o método Remove retorna um valor que indica o sucesso, não é necessário para procurar a existência de uma chave antes de tentar remover o par chave/valor da <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>instância.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The key of the key/value pair to be removed from the connection string in this <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A chave do par chave/valor a ser removido da cadeia de conexão neste <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key existed within the connection string and was removed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the key did not exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave existe na cadeia de caracteres de conexão e foi removida; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a chave não existe.

trans-unit.source: keyword is null ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keywordé nulo ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from this <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um valor correspondente para a chave fornecida neste <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The TryGetValue method lets developers safely retrieve a value from a <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder> without needing to verify that the supplied key name is a valid key name.
trans-unit.target: O método TryGetValue permite que os desenvolvedores recuperar com segurança um valor de um <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>sem a necessidade de verificar se o nome de chave fornecido é um nome de chave válido.</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Because TryGetValue does not raise an exception when you pass in a nonexistent key, you do not have to look for a key before retrieving its value.
trans-unit.target: Porque TryGetValue não gera uma exceção quando você passar uma chave que não existe, não é necessário que procurar uma chave antes de recuperar seu valor.

trans-unit.source: Calling TryGetValue with a nonexistent key places the value null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Chamando TryGetValue com uma chave inexistente coloca o valor null (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) no `value` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A chave do item a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: The value corresponding to `keyword.`
trans-unit.target: O valor correspondente a`keyword.`

trans-unit.source: if keyword was found within the connection string; otherwise .
trans-unit.target: Se keyword foi encontrado na cadeia de caracteres de conexão; caso contrário .
